description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character is part of a Squad that successfully suprises a group of foes that is attempting to remain concealed (and who achieved 1+ DoS on their Stealth Tests). Whenever this character spends a Fate Point to re-roll a failed Perception Test, roll 1d10, on a 9 they regain the spent Fate Point but still get the benefit of having spent it.
